sn35.86:1: Sitting to one side, the Venerable Ānanda said to the Blessed One: "Venerable sir, it would be good if the Blessed One would teach me the Dhamma in brief, so that, having heard the Dhamma from the Blessed One, I might dwell alone, withdrawn, diligent, ardent, and resolute."
sn35.86:2: "What do you think, Ānanda, is the eye permanent or impermanent?" - "Impermanent, venerable sir."Complete as in §3, down to "there is no more for this state of being."sn.iv.55
